pkgmetadata.longdescription: Functions for Set-Theoretic Multi-Method Research and Advanced QCA // Functions for performing set-theoretic multi-method research, QCA for clustered data, theory evaluation, Enhanced Standard Analysis, indirect calibration, radar visualisations. Additionally it includes data to replicate the examples in the book by Oana, I.E, C. Q. Schneider, and E. Thomann. Qualitative Comparative Analysis (QCA) using R: A Gentle Introduction. Cambridge University Press and C. Q. Schneider and C. Wagemann "Set Theoretic Methods for the Social Sciences", Cambridge University Press.
